summary.para: Contains classes which implement the main functionality of the DXGrid for WPF suite. To use these classes in XAML code, add the xmlns:dxg=”“ namespace reference.
Allows you to enable edit operations in a Data Grid bound to a Server Mode or Instant Feedback data source.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.AllowCancelAsyncOperations

summary.para: Gets or sets whether users can cancel asynchronous “Post Changes” operations.

member.value: true to allow users to cancel asynchronous “Post Changes” operations; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.CreateCommand

summary.para: Invokes the dialog edit form to allow users to add a new row to the control.

member.value: A routed command that implements the .

summary.para: Occurs before a user invokes the dialog edit form. This event allows you to specify a view model for the edit operation.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.CreateEditItemViewModelCommand

summary.para: Gets or sets a command that specifies a View Model for the edit operation. The behavior executes this command before the edit form dialog appears.

member.value: A command that specifies a View Model for the edit operation.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.DeleteCommand

summary.para: Deletes selected rows from the control.

member.value: A routed command that implements the .

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.EditTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a template that defines editors in the dialog edit form. Use the event or the to specify the template’s data context.

member.value: A template that defines editors in the dialog edit form.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Gets or sets a key field that you can use to find rows during edit operations.
Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.RowDoubleClickCommand

summary.para: Executes the or depending on the selected row. This command is designed to allow you to bind it to the TableView.RowDoubleClickCommand / TreeListView.RowDoubleClickCommand.

member.value: A command that you can bind to the TableView.RowDoubleClickCommand / TreeListView.RowDoubleClickCommand.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.UpdateCommand

summary.para: Invokes the dialog edit form for the selected row.

member.value: A routed command that implements the .

summary.para: Occurs after a user saves changes made in the dialog edit form. This event allows you to validate values, check database constraints, and save changes to the database.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.ValidateRowCommand

summary.para: Gets or sets a command that validates input values, checks database constraints, and saves changes to the database. The behavior executes this command after a user saves changes made in the edit form dialog.

member.value: A command that validates input values, checks database constraints, and saves changes to the database.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Occurs after a user removes selected rows from the control. This event allows you to validate rows, check database constraints, and delete rows from the database.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Grid.DialogEditFormBehavior.ValidateRowDeletionCommand

summary.para: Gets or sets a command that validates data, checks database constrains, and deletes rows. The behavior executes this command when user deletes selected rows.

member.value: A command that validates data, checks database constrains, and deletes rows.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
